response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which holds significant value for us and has been meticulously designed to cater to your needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its worth to both parties, I propose a fair transaction price of $11,000. This offer aims to provide you with substantial value while ensuring a reasonable return for us. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 11000}
